thing-type.label: Switcheable Roller/Shutter/Blind
thing-type.description: This Thing defines a KNX Roller/Shutter/Blind actor with Switch (ON/OFF) command support

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The individual address in area.line.device notation

parameter.name: upDownGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to move the shutter in the DOWN or UP direction

parameter.name: upDownStatusGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read actual direction the shutter is moving

parameter.name: stopMoveGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to start (MOVE) or STOP shutter movement

parameter.name: stopMoveStatusGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the motion status of the shutters

parameter.name: positionGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to set the absolute position of the shutter, in %

parameter.name: positionStatusGA
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the absolute positin of the shutter

parameter.name: read
parameter.label: Read
parameter.description: Flag to indicate if group addresses should be read at startup

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Interval between attempts to read the group addresses on the bus, in seconds

channel-type.label: Input/Output Channel
channel-type.description: The channel to control the shutter
